- PROJECT-OVERVIEW.md - Complete project blueprint

### 03-features/ - Features

### 04-deployment/ - Deployment

### 05-progress/ - Progress Tracking

### 06-contributing/ - Contributing

- GIT-COMMANDS.md - Git reference

## Updating Documentation

When you add a new feature:

1. Update relevant documentation in `docs/`
2. Add entry to [Changelog](../docs/05-progress/CHANGELOG.md)
3. Update [INDEX.md](../docs/INDEX.md) if needed
4. Submit PR with documentation changes
